entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Chambly
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:24 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -7.7°C

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 5 cm across upper Richelieu. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023
